data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Creating a new second-level namespace (X11::FreeDesktop) creates a
    place for other modules that implement FreeDesktop.org
    specifications, which are expected to follow at some time in the
    future. The FreeDesktop.org effort is closely tied to X11 so there's
    no real need for a top-level namespace.
